body_html: As a start, I would canonicalize the #ifdefs into as few as possible per file. It looks like you sometimes have a few per set of includes, which could all be grouped into one. That should make it significantly fewer
body_text: As a start, I would canonicalize the #ifdefs into as few as possible per file. It looks like you sometimes have a few per set of includes, which could all be grouped into one. That should make it significantly fewer
body: As a start, I would canonicalize the `#ifdef`s into as few as possible per file. It looks like you sometimes have a few per set of includes, which could all be grouped into one. That should make it significantly fewer
